src:
NAMEREG sA, cnt
NAMEREG sB, cc
NAMEREG s1, indH
NAMEREG s0, indL
NAMEREG s2, tmp

; Init LCD
CALL initLCD

; Write custom characters
LOAD tmp, 40
OUTPUT tmp, 5
LOAD indH, 1
LOAD indL, 0
ccrLoop:
CALL@ (indH, indL)
OUTPUT cc, 6
ADD indL, 1
COMPARE indL, 0d64
JUMP NZ, ccrLoop

LOAD tmp, 80
OUTPUT tmp, 5
LOAD cnt, 0
wLoop:
OUTPUT cnt, 6
ADD cnt, 1
TEST cnt, 0x1F
JUMP Z, hanScr
TEST cnt, 0xF
JUMP Z, hanRow
JUMP wLoop

hanRow:
LOAD cc, 0xC0
OUTPUT cc, 5
JUMP wLoop

hanScr:
LOAD cc, 1
OUTPUT cc, 5
JUMP wLoop

initLCD:
LOAD tmp, 3C
OUTPUT tmp, 5
LOAD tmp, 0E
OUTPUT tmp, 5
LOAD tmp, 01
OUTPUT tmp, 5
RETURN

; Custom characters
ADDRESS 100
; C0
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00101
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00101
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00101
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
; C1
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
; C2
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
; C3
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
; C4
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00101
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00101
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
; C5
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
; C6
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00101
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
; C7
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11100
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b11000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b10000
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00111
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
LOAD&RETURN cc, 0b00001
